mean_en: connected with genes (= the units in the cells of a living thing that control its physical characteristics) or genetics (= the study of genes )
sentence: Once I saw her mother, I realized that her blonde hair must be genetic.
sentence_trans: 一看到她母亲，我就明白了她的金发是遗传的。
word_etyma: gen出生，产生 + etic与……相关的 → 与出生相关的 → genetic基因的，遗传学的
